mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and layout for faster loading and better adaptability on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the size of images and scripts to improve the load time, especially for mobile users.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta tags, titles, and include more relevant keywords for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Add more interactive elements like reviews or nearby attractions to engage users further.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form and consider adding a progress bar to show users how many steps are left.
tips: Optimize image sizes for quicker loading
Add more detailed descriptions for rooms and amenities
Implement SSL security for trust and SEO boost
